html:
Size O

One off, teardrop ring. Handmade using stirling silver and hand-mined, ethically sourced, chrysoprase from Western Australia. Beautiful apple green colour, almost perfectly uniform with a small white speck - like a white horse on top of a wave. Stamped 925 and set in a backless setting so the light can shine through and really show off the stone.

Stunning, translucent, ethically sourced, Australian chrysoprase drop earrings, set in sterling silver caps.

These earrings really glow when they catch the light.

Beautifully intricate, fine silver shell. Modelled on a shell found by me, and presented on a stirling silver, 16-inch chain.

No live shells used.

Size P/O

Cute, little cushion-shaped chrysoprase, hand-mined and ethically sourced in Western Australia. Carefully finished in a backless sterling silver setting, to accentuate the colour.

I love the beautiful turquoise colour of this stone. The little veins remind me of a turtle shell.

Chrysoprase and stirling silver.

This one reminds me of where the earthy water of an estuary meets the bright blue turquoise water off-shore.

Size P½

Beautiful and unusual translucent chrysoprase ring. Ethically sourced from Western Australia, this stone captures the essence of water meeting land, with earthly tones and beautiful shades of apple green.

This stone reminds me of a river in summer, surrounded by lucious trees running alongside smooth pebbles.

SOLD, but more stones like this are on the way. Contact me for more details, or custom commissions

Lovely, medium sized, square-shaped ring. Handmade using hand-mined, ethically sourced chrysoprase from Western Australia, and stirling silver.

Like the ocean jumped into a stone!

Made to order

Cute ammonite studs based on an ammonite found in the UK. Recycled fine silver, with sterling silver posts and earbacks. Perfect little studs for everyday wear and fossil fans.

Beautiful, turquoise, ethically sourced chrysoprase pendant, wrapped in a minimalist, sterling silver setting so you can enjoy all of the stone!

Chain not included

Unusual triangle crysoprase in a minimalist stirling silver setting, with an oversized feature loop and an additional jump ring, big enough to use a chunky chain and wear it long!

Deep jade green with earthy tones on the back.

Chain not included, but contact me if you'd like some options

Turquoise coloured, large teardrop chrysoprase, in backless sterling silver setting. Oversized feature loop with additional hoop, big enough to accept a chunky chain so you can wear it long!

Chain not included, but contact me if you'd like some options
